title: Process Partner Deal Registration
description: A reseller partner submits a new deal registration for a lead they have sourced.

tasks.description: Receive the deal registration request from the partner portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews the submitted lead details.

tasks.description: Check the CRM to ensure the lead is not an existing customer or already in the sales pipeline (de-duplication).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the lead is new and not an existing opportunity.

tasks.description: Approve the deal registration, linking the new opportunity to the partner's account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent approves the registration, ensuring the partner will get credit for the deal.
